description: This file is a Bash script fragment used in the build configuration of a Linux kernel package within the Yocto Project build system. It contains variable definitions, function declarations, and build instructions specific to kernel configuration, such as enabling features, setting parameters, and including logos and other options.

methods.name: kernel_conf_variable
methods.description: Defines or unsets kernel configuration options based on parameters.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Prepares the kernel configuration by setting various config options, including logo support, OABI compatibility, and other kernel features.

methods.name: do_configure:prepend
methods.description: Prepends configuration commands and conditions before the main configuration process, handling logo inclusion and feature enablement.

methods.name: do_configure:append
methods.description: Appends additional configuration modifications post main configuration, such as modifying Makefile rules.

methods.name: do_install:append
methods.description: Adds commands to install kernel headers after build completion.
